topics.body: I've been terribly Tired today.
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f37a8b6368727116830200#post_54f37a8b6368727116830200
I was terribly tired yesterday. I was awake for a grand total of 14 hours and I felt like I hadn't slept in probably twice as long.

In comparison, today I slept for 6 hours, and yesterday I slept for 10 or 11. I feel well rested today, it's really odd.
topics.author: 9ba2e84e636164642cc03200

topics.body:
"@EHAN":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f37ad96368720510370100#post_54f37ad96368720510370100
I think that's exactly whats happening to me today, like keep having to rest throughout the day.

Tough I should feel rested by now?
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f37c6b63687251c9f51c00#post_54f37c6b63687251c9f51c00
In my experience, there's a point where the longer I sleep, the more tired I feel. It seems to be just past 8 hours.

I can easily run on an average 5 to 7 hours, even possibly 4 hours if I have to. Anything less though is really pushing it for me.
topics.author: 9ba2e84e636164642cc03200
